title: But Darling, I'm Your Auntie Mame!: The Amazing History of the World's Favorite Madcap Aunt
description: An in depth retrospective of the Auntie Mame novels. Also providing a close-up look at the many stage productions of the musical, the film adaptations, and other media inspired by Patrick Dennis's best-selling novel Auntie Mame. Taking a look at the creation of this legendary fictional character and the impact it had on the lives and careers of such celebrities as Rosalind Russell, Angela Lansbury, and Lucille Ball who took on the role of Mame. Reprint. 15,000 first printing.
author: Richard  Tyler Jordan
